summary: A man runs a broken down tourist trap along the Colorado River along with his French wife and his daughter. Business is so bad that he must pay a local alcoholic to entice tourists, called "suckers", to spend some time and money there.
cast: Jackie Moran|Babette Bardot|Adele Rein|Frank Bolger|Alaina Capri|John Furlong|Ken Swofford|Andrew Hagara|George Costello
title: How Much Loving Does a Normal Couple Need?
